Posts.Title: bone mets?? MaryK9 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: MaryK9 wrote: Hi - I was diagnosed with BC 7 years ago, Stage 3A.  For the past couple of months, I've had sciatica down the side of my leg while lying down, especially on my side (lots of trouble sleeping because of it).  I don't have the pain when standing, walking or sitting.  Am wondering whether this is a symptom of bone mets to the spine or hip.  Can anyone out there relate to this? Am scheduled to see the doctor next week.   Thanks. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: bone mets?? MaryK9 LuAnnH
